Articles.Content:
Greetings.  I'm not sure if this should go here or technical support, so mod's please relocate if need be.

I play on the PS4 KSP Enhanced Version with History and Parts Pack.  

 

There have been two early missions with basic requirements that by which i'm 100% positive I have fulfilled, and yet I do not receive credit for its completion.

a)  "Test the RT-5 Flee Booster on Launch Pad."  

Right.  "Have the RT-5" checked off green.  Good.  Have the "Be on the Launch Pad" checked off green.  Good.  These are the only requirements.   Now, when I choose the button "run test" to activate the engine, the mission does not complete.  When I activate the RT-5 through it's staging sequence alone, the mission does not complete.

What am I doing wrong?

 

b)  "Haul the RT-5 Flea Booster into Flight Above Kerbin"

Requirements:

Kerbin - check

Flying - check

Alt: 30,000: to 37,000 - check

Speed:  80 to 200 m/s of surface flight speed - check

Have the RT-5 Flea Solid Booster - NOPE!  UNCHECKED

 

The RT-5 is part of my second stage and is clearly attached directly to my command pod.  IN FACT, I have even reverted back to a simple cmd pod + RT-5 merely sitting on my launch pad to test things, and it STILL DOES NOT register my craft as having the RT-5.

 

What am I doing wrong?

 

This sucks.  I was really excited getting back into playing KSP after a years cessation, and now im running into trivial RT-5 requirements causing a really damper on my scientific spirit.  Any help is appreciated.

Welcome to the forum @WorstPilotEver.

I've moved your issue to Technical Support (PlayStation 4, XBox One).
I've got the same problems with this contracts on ps4 so this already not one-time problem

Same Situation here.

The very first contract cannot be finished

On 7/5/2019 at 7:44 PM, WorstPilotEver said:

a)  "Test the RT-5 Flee Booster on Launch Pad."  

Right.  "Have the RT-5" checked off green.  Good.  Have the "Be on the Launch Pad" checked off green.  Good.  These are the only requirements.   Now, when I choose the button "run test" to activate the engine, the mission does not complete.  When I activate the RT-5 through it's staging sequence alone, the mission does not complete.

PS4Pro, latest KSP-update installed, added the DLC yesterday (which is not working correctly either...I will make a new post about it, as I could not find any further infos on that).

Edited August 18, 2019 by Peri
typo
